item.name: CPU utilization on management plane
item.description: CPU load average over last 60 seconds. This value will match the value shown on the GUI dashboard-> resource information-> % CPU in PAN-OS 3.x

item.name: Utilization of CPUs on dataplane that are used for system functions
item.description: CPU load average over last 60 seconds
